alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Oakland County through 400 PM EDT... At 307 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Whitmore Lake to near Salem to near Detroit. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Livonia around 340 PM EDT. West Bloomfield around 355 PM EDT. Southfield, Royal Oak and Birmingham around 400 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Madison Heights, Orchard Lake, Clawson, Berkley, Oak Park, Commerce, New Hudson, Hazel Park and Walled Lake. People attending Royal Oak Outdoor Outfair , and Royal Oak Taco Fest should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
